description: This file defines the CreateGameRequest class, which is used as a Data Transfer Object (DTO) for creating a new game in the chess game backend. It contains fields for specifying the white and optional black players, along with their getter and setter methods, and uses Swagger annotations for API documentation.

classes.name: CreateGameRequest
classes.description: DTO class for create game request, encapsulating player identifiers and Swagger documentation annotations.

methods.name: getWhitePlayer
methods.description: Returns the identifier of the white player.

methods.name: setWhitePlayer
methods.description: Sets the identifier of the white player.

methods.name: getBlackPlayer
methods.description: Returns the identifier of the black player if specified.

methods.name: setBlackPlayer
methods.description: Sets the identifier of the black player.
